etymology.interpretation: Water element signals a relation to bodies of water. 州 provides the sound zhōu and originally referred to a river islet or sandbank, aligning with the meaning ‘river island’ and later extending to ‘continent.’

examples.chinese: 亚洲是世界上人口最多的洲(亞洲是世界上人口最多的洲)。
examples.pinyin: Yàzhōu shì shìjiè shàng rénkǒu zuì duō de zhōu.
examples.english: Asia is one of the most populous continents in the world.

examples.chinese: 这条大江中间有一座沙洲(這條大江中間有一座沙洲)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè tiáo dàjiāng zhōngjiān yǒu yī zuò shāzhōu.
examples.english: There is a sandbar island in the middle of this great river.

examples.chinese: 洲际航班需要飞很多小时(洲際航班需要飛很多小時)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōujì hángbān xūyào fēi hěn duō xiǎoshí.
